CustomField.description: Updated for story BIZ- 49977 to calculate the Prime service discount%
CustomField.formula: IF ((Services_Discount_Percentag_Prime__c)*100 = 0 && (Associated_prime_product__c = true) , 0, IF((((Services_Discount_Percentag_Prime__c)*100 < 20 && (Associated_prime_product__c = true))|| ((Services_Discount_Percentag_Prime__c)*100>=20 && (Associated_prime_product__c = true) &&( Retainer_Amount__c <= 40))),6,IF(((Services_Discount_Percentag_Prime__c)*100>=20 && (Associated_prime_product__c = true) &&( Retainer_Amount__c > 40)) ,7,0)))
CustomField.label: Prime discount level
